RelatedSentence: - The last of tens of thousands of evacuees returned home Saturday after firefighters scoured charred hillsides north of San Diego to guard against a resurgence of flames that ripped through the region this week .

RelatedSentence: For those battling a series of blazes for days , the relief was mixed with a sense of dread that drought - sapped vegetation , high temperatures and low humidity portend a long fire season ahead .
